name: Contract Demon
summary: CONTRACT DEMON is a visual novel created for NaNoRenO 2019. an angel summons a demon, and they end up... in love?! it takes 20-30 minutes to read through the story. there are no choices or alternate endings.
info:
• 中文名: 契约恶魔

  • 平台: PC
